oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Eliza Jane McReynolds to her brother Capt. Aaron Gamble McReynolds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This letter by Eliza Jane McReynolds of Blount County, Tennessee, to her brother Capt. Aaron McReynolds, USA, provides news of family and crops from home. Aaron Gamble McReynolds enlisted in Co. H, 2nd Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. On June 4, 1864, he was appointed Capt. of Co. D, 2nd Tenn. Cav. McReynolds died in the Battle of Decatur, Ala., on October 26, 1864.
